name: Trick Or
description:
Treat the demon world with vengeance.

A cautionary tale of taking candy from strangers.

Halloween was her favorite holiday, until supernatural dream and reality collided. Driven by vengeance, she will now do the the unthinkable to vainly stab back at the darkness.

She will pass out candy to kids on Halloween, year after year. But, to achieve vengeance, she must poison some candy in hopes of actual demons eating it. Be careful though, the police will be on the lookout when/if she poisons human children, and the demons won't take kindly to their children being poisoned either.

Can she live out her natural life span? Will she be caught, or killed, before that? Will she have her vengeance? Will she be worse than the monsters she hunts?
